Description.0: Assignment: Review of GIS applications for agriculture. This will include: * scientific literature review * commercial technology review * implementation issues identified during practicals
Description.1: Assignment: Review of remote sensing applications for agriculture. This will include: * scientific literature review * commercial technology review * implementation issues identified during practicals
Description.2: Class Test: Practical examination (2 hrs) integrating GIS and remote sensing. Ground truth and satellite data will be provided, that have to be imported into the GIS, and used to calculate an outcome.
